mapper.insert: insert into business_log(log_date,log_dept,log_client,log_project,log_no,log_content) values(#{business_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{business_dept, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{business_client, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{business_project, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{business_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{business_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
